description: Count of HCCs (0-107); includes unique HCCs or groups
definition: HCC_CNT = SUM(HHS_HCC*, G*)
if HHS_HCC002 = 1 then SEVERE = 1;
if HHS_HCC018 = 1 then TRANSPLANT = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 1 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT1 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 2 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT2 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 3 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT3 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 4 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT4 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 5 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT5 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT = 6 or HCC_CNT = 7 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT6_7 = 1;
if SEVERE = 1 and HCC_CNT >= 8 then SEVERE_HCC_COUNT8PLUS = 1;

description: Transplant severe illness, 4 or more HCCs
definition: if TRANSPLANT = 1 and HCC_CNT >= 4 then TRANSPLANT_HCC_COUNT4PLUS = 1;

description: Risk scores, one each for Platinum, Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Catastrophic levels
variable_used_in_risk_score_formula?: Risk score formula for each metal level
definition: Sum of (0/1 variable x Table 9 coefficient) over all of the following:
0/1 payment model HCCs,
0/1 age-sex categories for CHILD model,
0/1 HCC groups for CHILD model.
Note that coefficients may differ by metal level but designation of 0/1 variables does not.

description: Cost sharing reduction (CSR) adjusted risk scores, one each for Platinum, Gold, Silver, Bronze, and Catastrophic levels
variable_used_in_risk_score_formula?: CSR adjusted risk score formula for each metal level
definition: if CSR_INDICATOR = 2 then CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD_GOLD = SCORE_CHILD_GOLD x 1.07;
else if CSR_INDICATOR = 3 then CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD_SILVER = SCORE_CHILD_SILVER x 1.12;
else if CSR_INDICATOR = 4 then CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD_BRONZE = SCORE_CHILD_BRONZE x 1.15;
else do;
CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD_PLATINUM = SCORE_CHILD_PLATINUM x 1.00;
SCORE_CHILD in { SCORE_CHILD_PLATINUM, SCORE_CHILD_GOLD, SCORE_CHILD_SILVER,

continuation.definition: SCORE_CHILD_BRONZE, SCORE_CHILD_CATASTROPHIC } depending on the enrollee's metal level

definition: CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD in { CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD_PLATINUM, CSR_ADJUSTED_SCORE_CHILD_GOLD,

continuation.definition: depending on the enrollee's metal level
